title: Indigo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Summon a blinding pillar of energy, rampage attacking a player. If you kill a town member, your attack level is increased by one stage and you have control over an extra anonymous vote the following day (majority is increased)
- Build your pyre, letting you choose an additional target when next attacking. This can stack if this ability is used multiple nights in a row.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you choose to build your pyre, you must use one of your abilities the following night. If no action is chosen, it is randomly decided.
- If the last town member has died and you have not fulfilled your second goal, the game will not end.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang every criminal and evildoer (Town goal) OR attack 5 players in one night and live to see the end of the game.
